mapper.sql: id, start_job_date, part_qq, recent_order_date, get_order_number, problem_rate, out_settle_count, out_delivery_count, total_reward, major, english_level, acceptable_subject, education, school, age, part_phone, part_alipay, referrer, master_hand

o.id, o.start_job_date, o.part_qq, recent_order_date, get_order_number, SUM(CASE WHEN t1.deduct is null or t1.deduct = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)/SUM(CASE WHEN t1.id is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as problem_rate, SUM(CASE WHEN t1.part_settle_state = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as out_settle_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t1.submit_state = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as out_delivery_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t1.part_money is null or t1.part_money = 0 THEN 0 ELSE t1.part_money END) - SUM(CASE WHEN t1.deduct is null or t1.deduct = 0 THEN 0 ELSE t1.deduct END) as total_reward, major, english_level, acceptable_subject, education, school, age, o.part_phone, o.part_alipay, referrer,master_hand

update oa_part_user
start_job_date = #{startJobDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
part_qq = #{partQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recent_order_date = #{recentOrderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update oa_part_user set start_job_date = #{startJobDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, part_qq = #{partQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recent_order_date = #{recentOrderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, get_order_number = #{getOrderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, problem_rate = #{problemRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_settle_count = #{outSettleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, out_delivery_count = #{outDeliveryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_reward = #{totalReward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_level = #{englishLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acceptable_subject = #{acceptableSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, part_phone = #{partPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_alipay = #{partAlipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, referrer = #{referrer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, master_hand = #{masterHand,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
